ISysComponent
public final class CSysHtmlConverter
extends CSysHtmlPageWriter

The class CSysHtmlConverter can process the kernel Information of html files.

Method Detail

createFromTemplate

public void createFromTemplate(String templatefileName,
                               Properties replacements)
                        throws FileNotFoundException,
                               IOException
Gets all html body text from templatefileName and spools it into this page. All placeholders matching to a given replacement are substituted by the value specified in replacement.

Parameters:
templatefileName - The name of the new file.
replacements - the replacements to make; Propertynames are equal the symbols in the template.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - if the templateFile or the replacements cannot be found
IOException - If writing fails

startKernel

public void startKernel()
Start the Kernel.

endKernel

public void endKernel()
End the Kernel.

stripFile

public void stripFile(String filename)
               throws IOException,
                      FileNotFoundException
Gets all html text from filename between <kernel> tags and spools it into this page. <kernel> tags itself is not echoed. Use startKernel() and endKernel() to have it in the output, too.

Parameters:
filename - name of the file to strip
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - if the templateFile or the replacements cannot be found
IOException - If writing fails
